channel.title: Npc tele
channel.description:
how can a npc tele you when you give the items what he want like npc doesnt need to talk but when you have like 40 noted sharks in players invetory then he tele the player to the coords
can anyone help me plz? :)

item.title: Npc tele
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

I can give you some pseudo-code and you can go off of that.

if npc is clicked {
     if player has 40 noted sharks in his inv {
            teleport
     } else {
            say, "You don't have enough sharks!"
     }
}

Read full topic
